text: Gladys Mercedes Nordenstrom-Krenek (May 23, 1924 â€“ July 5, 2016) was an American composer. She studied under Austrian composer Ernst Krenek at Hamline University. She later married him in 1950. She sometimes worked with Krenek on projects. After his death in 1991, she founded the Ernst Krenek Institute in 1998 and Krems die Ernst Krenek in 2004 in Vienna, Austria. In 2006, Nordenstrom was awarded the Decoration of Honour for Services to the Republic of Austria. She was born in Mora, Minnesota. Nordenstrom died on July 5, 2016 in Palm Springs, California, at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2016 deaths Category:American classical musicians Category:American composers Category:American pianists Category:Musicians from Minnesota Category:Recipients of the Decoration for Services to the Republic of Austria
title: Gladys Nordenstrom
